footer.tagline: SV2 mining gateway infrastructure for production pool operators.
cta.ready: Ready to deploy SV2 with confidence?
cta.sub: Shadow mode costs nothing. Observe mode builds trust. Inline mode protects revenue.
home.hero.label: Stratum V2 Infrastructure
home.hero.title:
SV2 mining gateway
built for production pools
home.hero.sub: ReserveGrid OS is a miner-facing Stratum V2 gateway with Noise NX encrypted transport, template verification, fail-closed prevhash switching, and a two-event share lifecycle. Every decision carries a machine-readable reason code.
home.problem.title:
SV2 enables miner autonomy.
That autonomy needs guardrails.
home.problem.sv2_body: Stratum V2 lets miners propose their own block templates. Pools gain encrypted transport and reduced bandwidth, but lose visibility into what miners submit. Without verification, a pool has no way to detect malformed templates, fee policy violations, or stale prevhash references before distributing work.
home.problem.rg_body: ReserveGrid OS sits between miners and the pool as a standard job server. It verifies every template against operator policy, switches prevhash references with fail-closed safety, tracks shares through a two-event lifecycle, and emits structured reason codes for every decision.
home.arch.title: End-to-end gateway flow
home.arch.sub: From miner handshake to upstream share submission, every hop is observable.
home.arch.callout: The gateway also forwards valid shares upstream via HTTP POST to the pool backend. Shares flow through a bounded queue with configurable backpressure policy.
home.cap.title: What the gateway handles
home.cap.modes_body: Shadow audits templates without miners. Observe logs verdicts without gating. Inline enforces policy with fail-closed safety. One binary, one config key.
home.cap.share_body: Every share produces share_accepted at ACK time and share_forward_result after upstream POST. Joined by share_id with a 1:1 invariant.
home.cap.prevhash_body: When a new block arrives, miners hold on stale work until the verifier responds. 50ms verdict timeout, 5s stale hold, deterministic disconnect on expiry.
home.cmp.title: What changes with ReserveGrid
home.out.title: What operators see
home.out.sub: Every verdict is structured, machine-readable, and carries the policy context that caused it.
p404.sub: This route returned no match. The page you requested does not exist or has been moved.
about.hero.label: About Veldra
about.hero.title: Mining infrastructure for the next era
about.hero.sub: We build the systems that enable miners and pools to operate SV2 with confidence.
about.who.title: A team focused on mining operator infrastructure
about.mission.title: Our mission
about.mission.body: To provide production-grade, policy-driven SV2 gateway infrastructure that operators can deploy with confidence. We believe in observable systems, machine-readable decisions, and fail-closed safety.
about.approach.title: Our approach
about.approach.body: Every feature in ReserveGrid OS is driven by operator feedback. We prioritize transparency, configurability, and operational safety. One binary, multiple deployment modes, and reason codes for every decision.
about.product.title: ReserveGrid OS
about.product.sub: A Stratum V2 mining gateway built for production pool operators.
about.tech.title: The ReserveGrid stack
about.tech.gateway_desc: Miner-facing SV2 endpoint with Noise NX encrypted transport and dynamic job distribution.
about.tech.verifier_desc: Template verification engine with 34 reason codes and policy-driven decision logic.
about.tech.tmgr_desc: Block template poller and router with prevhash tracking and fail-closed switching.
about.tech.protocol_desc: Stratum V2 with Noise NX encryption, custom extensions for reason codes, and structured event streams.
about.eng.title: Built on proven systems
about.eng.p1_body: Memory safety and fearless concurrency. No garbage collection, no surprises at 3 AM.
about.eng.p2_body: Each component is independently testable and deployable. Architecture follows operator workflow.
about.eng.p3_body: Every decision is logged with context. Prometheus metrics, event streams, and Grafana dashboards built in.
about.eng.p4_body: When in doubt, the gateway rejects work. Deterministic timeouts, bounded queues, and clear policy enforcement.
about.eng.p5_body: 51 TOML keys plus environment variable overrides. No runtime GUI, no magic defaults.
about.eng.p6_body: Every rejection carries machine-readable context. Operators see why, when, and under which policy.
about.contact.title: Have questions about ReserveGrid?
product.hero.label: Product
product.hero.title: Confidence through configuration
product.hero.sub: ReserveGrid OS is a policy-driven SV2 gateway. Configure your requirements, deploy your way, observe the results.
product.modes.title: Three ways to deploy
product.modes.shadow.title: Shadow Mode
product.modes.shadow.use: Use case: Learning, proof of concept
product.modes.observe.title: Observe Mode
product.modes.observe.desc: Log verdicts, forward all shares upstream
product.modes.observe.use: Use case: Build operator trust, gradual adoption
product.modes.inline.title: Inline Mode
product.features.title: Built for operators
product.f1.title: Noise NX encryption
product.f1.desc: Industry-standard elliptic curve transport. Miners encrypt their payloads; pools decrypt with a fixed key.
product.f2.title: 34 reason codes
product.f2.desc: Every rejection is machine-readable. Operators know why work was rejected and under which policy context.
product.f3.title: Fail-closed prevhash
product.f3.desc: 50ms verdict timeout. 5s stale work hold. Miners disconnected deterministically on expiry.
product.f4.title: Two-event lifecycle
product.f4.desc: share_accepted at ACK time, share_forward_result after upstream POST. Joined by share_id with 1:1 invariant.
product.f5.title: Configurable backpressure
product.f5.desc: Bounded share queue with policy-driven overflow behavior. Protect pool infrastructure from downstream storms.
product.f6.title: Observability
product.f6.desc: Prometheus metrics, structured event logs, and Grafana dashboards. See every decision in real time.
product.config.title: 51 TOML keys, zero magic
product.config.intro: ReserveGrid OS is configured via TOML with environment variable overrides. No defaults hide pool behavior.
product.security.title: Operator first
product.security.c1.title: Encrypted transport
product.security.c1.desc: Noise NX with fixed keys. No certificate infrastructure, no external dependencies.
product.security.c2.title: Fail-closed logic
product.security.c2.desc: Timeouts are deterministic. Stale work is held. Invalid templates trigger rejections with reason codes.
product.security.c3.title: Auditability
product.security.c3.desc: Every event is logged with context. Operators can reconstruct decisions offline.
product.demo.title: Try it now
product.demo.desc: Experience ReserveGrid OS in observe mode with a live SV2 testnet.

observe.hero.title: Observe Mode Dashboard
observe.hero.sub: Real-time monitoring of your SV2 gateway in observe mode.
observe.auth.title: Gateway Authentication
observe.arch.title: Architecture
observe.arch.desc: The gateway emits structured events for every share decision. This dashboard subscribes to those events in real time.
observe.tech.title: Technology
observe.tech.events_desc: Every share generates machine-readable events with reason codes and policy context.
observe.tech.metrics_desc: Standard metrics exported on /metrics endpoint. Integrate with Grafana for long-term trends.
observe.tech.logs_desc: JSON event logs for offline analysis and audit trails.
observe.verdicts.title: Verdict Catalog
legal.privacy.title: Privacy Policy
legal.privacy.s1.title: 1. Introduction
legal.privacy.s1.body: Veldra, Inc. ("we," "us," or "our") operates the ReserveGrid OS gateway and associated services. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and otherwise handle your information when you use our website, software, and services.
legal.privacy.s2.title: 2. Information We Collect
legal.privacy.s2.body: We collect information you provide directly, such as when you create an account, contact us, or use our services. This may include your name, email address, company information, and technical configuration data. We also automatically collect certain technical information, including IP addresses, browser type, operating system, and usage patterns.
legal.privacy.s3.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
legal.privacy.s3.body: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services; communicate with you; respond to your requests; and comply with legal obligations. We also use aggregated, anonymized data to understand usage patterns and optimize performance.
legal.privacy.s4.title: 4. Information Sharing
legal.privacy.s4.body: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business, subject to confidentiality agreements. We may also disclose information when required by law or to protect our rights.
legal.privacy.s5.title: 5. Data Security
legal.privacy.s5.body: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is completely secure.
legal.privacy.s6.title: 6. Data Retention
legal.privacy.s6.body: We retain personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law.
legal.privacy.s7.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking
legal.privacy.s7.body: Our website uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience. You can control cookie settings through your browser, but disabling cookies may affect website functionality.
legal.privacy.s8.title: 8. Third-Party Links
legal.privacy.s8.body: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external sites. We encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any information.
legal.privacy.s9.title: 9. Your Rights
legal.privacy.s9.body: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have rights to access, correct, delete, or port your personal information. Please contact us to exercise these rights.
legal.privacy.s10.title: 10. Policy Updates
legal.privacy.s10.body: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of material changes by posting the updated policy on our website and updating the effective date.
legal.terms.title: Terms of Service
legal.terms.s1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
legal.terms.s1.body: By accessing and using the ReserveGrid OS software, website, and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, do not use our services.
legal.terms.s2.title: 2. License Grant
legal.terms.s2.body: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use ReserveGrid OS in accordance with the terms of this agreement and applicable open-source licenses.
legal.terms.s3.title: 3. Acceptable Use
legal.terms.s3.body: You agree not to use our services for illegal purposes, to reverse-engineer the software, to disrupt service availability, or to circumvent security measures. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your credentials.
legal.terms.s4.title: 4. Intellectual Property
legal.terms.s4.body: ReserveGrid OS and associated documentation are owned or licensed by Veldra, Inc. You may not reproduce, distribute, or publicly display our content without permission, except as permitted by open-source licenses.
legal.terms.s5.title: 5. Limitations of Liability
legal.terms.s5.body: Our services are provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. To the fullest extent permitted by law, Veldra shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services.
legal.terms.s6.title: 6. Indemnification
legal.terms.s6.body: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Veldra from any claims, damages, or costs arising from your violation of these terms or misuse of our services.
legal.terms.s7.title: 7. Service Modifications
legal.terms.s7.body: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue our services at any time. We will provide reasonable notice of material changes.
legal.terms.s8.title: 8. Termination
legal.terms.s8.body: We may terminate your access to our services if you violate these terms or engage in illegal activity. Your rights under applicable licenses will survive termination.
legal.terms.s9.title: 9. Governing Law
legal.terms.s9.body: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Veldra, Inc. is established, without regard to conflict of law principles.
legal.terms.s10.title: 10. Dispute Resolution
legal.terms.s10.body: Any disputes arising from these terms shall be resolved through binding arbitration, except for claims of intellectual property infringement, which may be brought in court.
legal.terms.s11.title: 11. Entire Agreement
legal.terms.s11.body: These Terms of Service constitute the entire agreement between you and Veldra regarding your use of our services.
legal.terms.s12.title: 12. Severability
legal.terms.s12.body: If any provision of these terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect.
legal.terms.s13.title: 13. Waiver
legal.terms.s13.body: Our failure to enforce any provision of these terms does not constitute a waiver of that provision or any other provision.
legal.terms.s14.title: 14. Amendments
legal.terms.s14.body: We reserve the right to amend these Terms of Service at any time. Continued use of our services following notice of amendments constitutes acceptance.
legal.terms.s15.title: 15. Contact Information
legal.terms.s15.body: For questions regarding these Terms of Service, please contact us at legal@veldra.io.
legal.disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
legal.disclaimer.s1.title: 1. No Warranty
legal.disclaimer.s1.body: ReserveGrid OS is provided "as is" without any warranties, express or implied. We do not warrant that the software is error-free, secure, or suitable for any particular purpose.
legal.disclaimer.s2.title: 2. Use at Your Own Risk
legal.disclaimer.s2.body: You use ReserveGrid OS entirely at your own risk. We are not responsible for any loss of revenue, data, or other damages resulting from the use or inability to use our software.
legal.disclaimer.s3.title: 3. No Liability for Third-Party Content
legal.disclaimer.s3.body: We are not responsible for third-party content, including block templates, market data, or information provided by upstream pool backends.
legal.disclaimer.s4.title: 4. Security Considerations
legal.disclaimer.s4.body: While we implement security measures, no system is completely secure. You are responsible for securing your gateway infrastructure, protecting private keys, and implementing access controls.
legal.disclaimer.s5.title: 5. Operational Responsibility
legal.disclaimer.s5.body: Pool operators are responsible for monitoring gateway performance, testing configurations, and maintaining backup systems. Veldra is not liable for operational failures or revenue loss.
legal.disclaimer.s6.title: 6. Cryptocurrency and Blockchain
legal.disclaimer.s6.body: ReserveGrid OS interacts with Bitcoin mining and blockchain infrastructure. Mining operations are subject to market volatility, regulatory changes, and technical risks beyond our control.
legal.disclaimer.s7.title: 7. Regulatory Compliance
legal.disclaimer.s7.body: Your use of ReserveGrid OS must comply with all applicable laws and regulations in your jurisdiction. We do not provide legal or regulatory advice.
legal.disclaimer.s8.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
legal.disclaimer.s8.body: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Veldra's total liability shall not exceed the fees you have paid to us in the past 12 months, or USD $100, whichever is greater.
legal.disclaimer.s9.title: 9. No Professional Advice
legal.disclaimer.s9.body: Nothing in our documentation, website, or communications constitutes financial, legal, technical, or professional advice. Consult appropriate professionals before making decisions based on our software.
legal.disclaimer.s10.title: 10. Changes and Updates
legal.disclaimer.s10.body: We may update ReserveGrid OS and this disclaimer at any time without notice. Continued use implies acceptance of such changes.
legal.disclaimer.s11.title: 11. Severability
legal.disclaimer.s11.body: If any portion of this disclaimer is found to be unenforceable, the remaining portions shall continue in full force and effect.

observe.catalog.title: Verdict reason code catalog
observe.catalog.sub: Every rejection carries a canonical, machine-readable reason_code. These codes are stable across protocol, verifier, exports, and documentation.
